HintText.Text: TIP: Hold [sprint] to sprint.
TIP: Hold [v_moveforward] to accelerate. [v_moveback] to brake or drive in reverse.
TIP: Hold [v_brake] for the handbrake. Press [vehicle.ul_melee_attack] for a door attack.
You've taken a lot of damage, reducing your MAXIMUM VITALITY.
TIP: Return home and let someone else take over.
TIP: Once you fully SEARCH this building, you can set up an OUTPOST here.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Radio home using [ul_radio_menu] to create an OUTPOST here.

HintText.Text: TIP: Radio home using [xi_dpad_down] (D-pad) to create an OUTPOST here.
TIP: Outposts create a small SAFE AREA and can be visited to RESUPPLY.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Radio home using [ul_radio_menu] to relocate your home base.

HintText.Text: TIP: Radio home using [xi_dpad_down] (D-pad) to relocate your home base.
TIP: If you relocate, you will abandon your current home.
TIP: Hold [sprint] to ascend or descend a ladder faster.
TIP: Hold [cover] to crouch down and make yourself harder to spot.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Press [ul_journal_menu] to open your journal and view inventory, skills, and community info.

HintText.Text: TIP: Press [xi_dpad_up] (D-pad) open your journal and view inventory, skills, and community info.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Press [ul_radio_menu] use your radio to call in favors.

HintText.Text: TIP: Press [xi_dpad_down] (D-pad) use your radio to call in favors.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Press [crouch] to turn your flashlight on or off.

HintText.Text: TIP: Click [crouch] to turn your flashlight on or off.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Press [v_lights] to turn your headlights on or off.

HintText.Text: TIP: Click [v_lights] to turn your headlights on or off.
TIP: You can now switch off between Maya and Marcus.
To switch, talk to Maya before starting a new mission.
TIP: Hold [emote_hold] to see character names and perform emotes.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Experiment with the different emotes your character can perform. Press [emote1], [emote2], [emote3], or [emote4].

HintText.Text: TIP: Experiment with the different emotes your character can perform. Hold [xi_triggerr] then press [xi_a], [xi_b], [xi_x], or [xi_y].
Drive to the parking area of your base, and any rucksacks in your vehicle will be delivered automatically.
TIP: Press [xi_use] to open or close a door.
TIP: Hold [xi_use] to build a barricade.
TIP: Press [xi_use] to check for supplies.
TIP: Spend INFLUENCE to take items.
TIP: Hold [xi_use] to search for supplies or useful items.
TIP: Hold [sprint] + [xi_use] to search FASTER but make more NOISE.
TIP: Press [xi_use] to enter or exit a car.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Press [drop] to drop rucksacks.

HintText.Text: TIP: Hold [emote_hold] and tap [item] to drop rucksacks.
TIP: The green icons represent mission opportunities.
TIP: The blue ring shows your mission objective.
TIP: Taking emergency supplies requires INFLUENCE.
Earn INFLUENCE by completing missions, gathering supplies, and defending your home.
TIP: Use [ui_lb] and [ui_rb] to view other item types.

KeyboardHintText.Text: You have new Events in your Journal! Press [ul_journal_menu] to open your Journal and review things that have happened to you on the Events page.

HintText.Text: You have new Events in your Journal! Press D-pad [xi_dpad_up] to open your Journal and review things that have happened to you on the Events page.

KeyboardHintText.Text: The Events page keeps a log of things that happen to you as you play, including new mission opportunities, results of previous missions, community events, skill upgrades, and global events that impact you and your fellow survivors in Trumbull Valley. Use the mouse to select an event to show more details such as the people involved, and the associated rewards and bonuses.

HintText.Text: The Events page keeps a log of things that happen to you as you play, including new mission opportunities, results of previous missions, community events, skill upgrades, and global events that impact you and your fellow survivors in Trumbull Valley. Use the D-pad to select an event and press [xi_a] to show more details such as the people involved, and the associated rewards and bonuses.

KeyboardHintText.Text: You've leveled up a Skill! Press [ul_journal_menu] to open your Journal and view your Skills and Abilities on the Survivor page.

HintText.Text: You've leveled up a Skill! Press D-pad [xi_dpad_up] to open your Journal and view your Skills and Abilities on the Survivor page.

KeyboardHintText.Text: The Survivor page is where you view your progress in various Skills. Everyone you encounter will have a different set of skills at their disposal. To learn more about a Skill such as how to train it up, how it helps you, and what new abilities it unlocks; select a Skill with the mouse. Some skills, such as Fighting, will allow you to further specialize and learn new techniques.

HintText.Text: The Survivor page is where you view your progress in various Skills. Everyone you encounter will have a different set of skills at their disposal. To learn more about a Skill such as how to train it up, how it helps you, and what new abilities it unlocks; select a Skill with the D-Pad and press [xi_a]. Some skills, such as Fighting, will allow you to further specialize and learn new techniques.

KeyboardHintText.Text: Press [ul_journal_menu] to open your Journal and manage your Inventory on the Survivor page.

HintText.Text: Press D-pad [xi_dpad_up] to open your Journal and manage your Inventory on the Survivor page.

KeyboardHintText.Text: The Survivor page shows information on your character, such as Name, Equipment, Traits, Skills, and Status. Use the mouse to highlight specific items to see more information. You can also use the mouse to manage items in your inventory. This is where you will Equip and Unequip weapons, Reload guns, Use consumables, and Destroy unwanted items.

HintText.Text: The Survivor page shows information on your character, such as Name, Equipment, Traits, Skills, and Status. Use the D-pad to highlight specific items to see more information. You can also use D-pad [xi_dpad_left] to manage items in your inventory. This is where you will Equip and Unequip weapons, Reload guns, Use consumables, and Destroy unwanted items.

KeyboardHintText.Text: You've joined a Community! Press [ul_journal_menu] to open your Journal and learn more about your fellow survivors on the Community page.

HintText.Text: You've joined a Community! Press D-pad [xi_dpad_up] to open your Journal and learn more about your fellow survivors on the Community page.

KeyboardHintText.Text: The Community page shows information on characters in your community. Character portraits may be shaded to indicate conditions such as Hurt, Sick, or Tired. Use the mouse to highlight a character and view Name, Equipment, Traits, Skills, and Status. Select the character to highlight specific items to see more information.

HintText.Text: The Community page shows information on characters in your community. Character portraits may be shaded to indicate conditions such as Hurt, Sick, or Tired. Use the D-pad to highlight a character and view Name, Equipment, Traits, Skills, and Status. Press [xi_a] and use the D-pad to highlight specific items to see more information.

KeyboardHintText.Text: You have a new Home! Press [ul_journal_menu] to open your Journal and view your Stockpiles and Possessions on the Assets page.

HintText.Text: You have a new Home! Press D-pad [xi_dpad_up] to open your Journal and view your Stockpiles and Possessions on the Assets page.

KeyboardHintText.Text: The Assets page is where you can get an overview of your Community's Assets. Use the mouse to highlight specific items to get more information. Status and Possessions show statistical information about your Community. Stockpiles are the resources you'll need to keep your Community alive, safe, and healthy.

HintText.Text: The Assets page is where you can get an overview of your Community's Assets. Use the D-Pad to highlight specific items to get more information. Status and Possessions show statistical information about your Community. Stockpiles are the resources you'll need to keep your Community alive, safe, and healthy.

KeyboardHintText.Text: Time to upgrade your Home! Press [ul_journal_menu] to open your Journal and build new Facilties on the Home page.

HintText.Text: Time to upgrade your Home! Press D-pad [xi_dpad_up] to open your Journal and build new Facilties on the Home page.

KeyboardHintText.Text: The Home page is where you can view, build, and upgrade your Community's Facilities. Use the mouse to select a Facility Slot and get more information about the bonuses it provides and the actions available. An Infirmary is critical when it comes to dealing with disease and injury; meanwhile a Garden will keep everyone fed, and a Watchtower will keep everyone safe.

HintText.Text: The Home page is where you can view, build, and upgrade your Community's Facilities. Use the D-Pad to select a Facility Slot and press [xi_a] to get more information about the bonuses it provides and the actions available. An Infirmary is critical when it comes to dealing with disease and injury; meanwhile a Garden will keep everyone fed, and a Watchtower will keep everyone safe.

KeyboardHintText.Text: You've added survivors to your Community! Press [ul_journal_menu] to open your Journal and learn about making Friends on the Community page.

HintText.Text: You've added survivors to your Community! Press D-pad [xi_dpad_up] to open your Journal and learn about making Friends on the Community page.

You can become Friends with many characters in the game after earning their full Trust. Your level of Trust with each character is represented by the green gauge. You can earn Trust with characters by helping them out on Missions and keeping the Community defended and well provisioned. When a character becomes your Friend you can play as that character by highlighting his or her portrait and pressing [ui_x] to "Switch to..."

Resource Bundles While searching you will occasionally find a bundle of resources that can be brought back to your home and added to your Community's Stockpile. Press [ui_click] to load it up and take it yourself, or press [ui_use] to radio in for some scavengers to take it for you. Alternatively you can press [ui_x] to break it open to get consumables of that resource type instead of adding it to your Community's Stockpile.

You'll need Food to prevent hunger, Medicine to ward off disease, Ammo to defend yourselves, Building Materials to construct new Facilities, and Fuel for projects in your Workshop. Stockpiles are adjusted every real-world day. The daily adjustment is determined by your Facilities, Population, and Outposts.
You've unlocked an Extra! Press [xi_dpad_left] and [xi_dpad_right] to switch between the Radio channel and the Extras channel.
TIP: Tap [cover] to defend.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Press [roll] to roll.

HintText.Text: TIP: Press [sprint] + [cover] to roll.
TIP: Press [ul_melee_attack] to attack.
TIP: Press [xi_use] to kick an enemy away from you.
TIP: Press [vehicle.ul_melee_attack] repeatedly to knock an enemy off the car door.
TIP: Press [jump] for a longer range attack.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Press [execute] to finish off a downed foe.

HintText.Text: TIP: Press [sprint] + [xi_use] to finish off a downed foe.

KeyboardHintText.Text: Hold [ul_aim] to aim. Press [ul_shoot] to shoot.

HintText.Text: Hold [ul_aim] to aim. Pull [ul_shoot] to shoot.
Press [aim.reload] to reload.
Press [aim.reload] to unjam your gun.

KeyboardHintText.Text: Press [camera] to toggle zoom with scoped weapons.

HintText.Text: Click in on [camera] to toggle zoom with scoped weapons.
Tap [jump] while aiming to cycle fire modes with capable weapons.
TIP: Attach a suppressor to muffle your gunshots.
TIP: Use an EXPLOSIVE or INCENDIARY to go out in a Blaze of Glory.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Press [execute] while sneaking to kill a zombie instantly

HintText.Text: TIP: Hold [sprint] + [xi_use] while sneaking to kill a zombie instantly
TIP: Press [ul_melee_attack] repeatedly to force open a locked door.
TIP: Move into a bush while crouched to hide completely.
You are HIDDEN. Remain in cover to avoid detection.
TIP: Press [ui_click] to set or clear a waypoint.
You are DROWNING. Get out of the water.
YOU ARE ENCUMBERED
YOU ARE NO LONGER ENCUMBERED
TIP: Your mobility and stamina are penalized if you carry too much weight.
You are still ENCUMBERED. Stamina will drain rapidly while sprinting.
Your game is not being saved. Complete the mission to save your progress.
TIP: Your game is not saved while you are on a mission. Complete the mission to save your progress.
TIP: Press [jump] repeatedly to get up.
TIP: Tap [cover] repeatedly to break free.
TIP: Tap [cover] repeatedly to break free.

KeyboardHintText.Text: Use [moveforward], [moveleft], [moveback], [moveright] to move.

HintText.Text: Use [xi_thumblx] to move.

KeyboardHintText.Text: Use the mouse to look around.

HintText.Text: Use [xi_thumbrx] to look around.
TIP: Tap [cover] to defend.
TIP: Press [ul_melee_attack] to attack. Press [cover] to defend.
TIP: Press [ul_melee_attack] to attack.
TIP: Press [jump] to jump and climb.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Press [execute] to shove an enemy away.

HintText.Text: TIP: Press [sprint] + [xi_use] to shove an enemy away.
Approach a container and press [xi_use] to search it.
TIP: Hold [sprint] to sprint.
TIP: Hold [sprint] to sprint. Press [jump] to jump and climb.
Hold [cover] to crouch down and make yourself harder to spot.
TIP: Move into a bush while crouched to hide completely.
TIP: Press [ul_map_menu] to view Mission Opportunities.

KeyboardHintText.Text: Hold [ul_aim] to aim. Press [ul_shoot] to shoot.

HintText.Text: Hold [ul_aim] to aim. Pull [ul_shoot] to shoot.
Hold [ul_aim] to aim your gun.
Press [ul_map_menu] to view your Map.
TIP: Surveying adds buildings and other points of interest to your map.
You can search all of these locations for resources, weapons, and other survivors.

KeyboardHintText.Text: Use [ui_scroll_down] to cycle between Mission Opportunities.

HintText.Text: Click [xi_thumbr] to cycle between Mission Opportunities.
Press [ui_click] to set a Waypoint.
You are now FATIGUED and have LOWER STAMINA.
Earn INFLUENCE by completing missions, gathering supplies, and defending your home.
Spend INFLUENCE for extra supplies or to influence others.
TIP: Press [xi_use] to open or close a door.
TIP: Press [ul_melee_attack] repeatedly to force open a locked door.
Use a firecracker to draw zombie attention to an area.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: Press [ul_journal_menu] and then [ui_lb] to view your HOME BASE.

HintText.Text: TIP: Press [xi_dpad_up] (D-pad) and then [xi_shoulderl] to view your HOME BASE.
TIP: Your top survival needs are FOOD, MEDICINE, and AMMUNITION.
Acquired TRUCK KEYS and RADIO.
Your equipped gun uses a different kind of ammunition.
Your equipped gun is fully loaded.
Your inventory is FULL.
This backpack is TOO SMALL to hold your current inventory.
Your gun already has a suppressor.
You must fully SEARCH a location before establishing an outpost there.
You must be in a BUILDING to set up an outpost.
This building is TOO SMALL to fortify.
This is ALREADY an OUTPOST.
This location is OCCUPIED by someone else.
Your community cannot support any more outposts.
The roads near you are too crowded.
Your community is NOT BUILDING anything right now.
Your inventory is FULL. There's no room for an ARTILLERY MARKER.
Use this after your MAXIMUM STAMINA has been reduced.
Use this after your MAXIMUM VITALITY has been reduced.
You've called in this favor too many times recently.
This already is your home!
You need to wait a bit before doing this again.
You cannot do this while in combat.
You have already added Milo to this community once.
You already own everything here!
You aren't near any supplies!
A SUPPLY RUN is already in progress here.
There are NO KNOWN RESOURCES here.
Max stamina is full. Stimulants temporarily recover some of your max stamina.
There are NO USABLE ITEMS in your inventory.
You do not have an item selected.
You cannot switch to someone who is INJURED.
You cannot switch to someone who is DEAD.
Once you reach 100% TRUST you can become FRIENDS.
You can SWITCH control to any of your FRIENDS.
It's hard to know how things stand when someone is MISSING.
It's hard to know how things stand when someone is FLEEING.
You cannot switch to someone who is BUSY.
Some people are too INDEPENDENT to ever give 100% trust.
You must earn 100% trust before BEFRIENDING someone.
You can't reach your journal right now.
The pages are too blood-soaked to read.
Some people are scared of books. Zombies, not so much.
This isn't the time for a little casual reading.
You can't reach your radio right now.
You can't reach your map right now.
Supplies must be brought HOME for distribution.
TIP: After exploring for a while, you will FATIGUE, lowering your available stamina.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: [ul_radio_menu] to talk to Pastor William again.

HintText.Text: TIP: [xi_dpad_down] (D-pad) to talk to Pastor William again.
Use repeated or loud NOISE to create a DISTRACTION.
Gunfire, explosions, firecrackers, and alarm clocks are just some of the ways to create a DISTRACTION.
Leave the area.
WIPED OUT: You and all your friends are DEAD.
Returning Home
You have 30 minutes remaining in your trial. Press [xi_start] to unlock the full game.
You have 15 minutes remaining in your trial. Press [xi_start] to unlock the full game.
You have 5 minutes remaining in your trial. Press [xi_start] to unlock the full game.
You have 1 minute remaining in your trial. Press [xi_start] to unlock the full game.
TIP: Use painkillers to restore Vitality
TIP: Eat a snack for a temporary stamina boost.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: [ul_prev_consumable] or [ul_next_consumable] to select an item. Press [item] to use the selected item.

HintText.Text: TIP: [xi_dpad_left] or [xi_dpad_right] (D-pad) to select an item. Press [xi_shoulderr] to use it.

KeyboardHintText.Text: TIP: [ul_prev_consumable] or [ul_next_consumable] to select an item. Press [item] to use the selected item.

HintText.Text: TIP: [xi_dpad_left] or [xi_dpad_right] (D-pad) to select an item. Press [xi_shoulderr] to use it.
Search the nearby towns for other survivors. Perhaps they'll take you in.
Zombies do not show up on your minimap from this difficulty level onwards.
Search the nearby towns for a good place to make your new home.
Search for a vehicle large enough to get you and your closest friends out of the valley.
We'll need to build a Workshop if we want to get the RV in working order.
Whenever you're ready to move on, you can tell your people to load up the RV from the Radio Room at your home.
Use the RV icon on the Home Tab of your Journal to prepare the RV for evacuation.
Speak to characters to send them to the RV. Space is limited, so choose wisely.
Your RV is full. Use the RV icon on the Home Tab of your Journal to escape the valley.
When you've unlocked a new Hero, look on your Map for a new Escort Mission to find that Hero.
Complete challenges listed in the Challenges Tab of your Journal to unlock new Heroes.
